QueryResult.text: SELECT INV_PROJECTS.PRUID, INV_PROJECTS.PRID, INV_PROJECTS.PRGUIDELINES, INV_PROJECTS.PRDEPARTMENT, INV_PROJECTS.PRVERSION, INV_PROJECTS.PRUSERTEXT6, INV_PROJECTS.PRUSERTEXT7, INV_PROJECTS.PRBUDGET, INV_INVESTMENTS.SCHEDULE_START, INV_PROJECTS.PRASOF, INV_INVESTMENTS.SCHEDULE_FINISH, INV_PROJECTS.PRCPMTYPE, INV_INVESTMENTS.TRACK_MODE, INV_INVESTMENTS.IS_OPEN_FOR_TE, INV_INVESTMENTS.CHARGECODEID, INV_PROJECTS.PRSPONSOREDBY, INV_PROJECTS.PRREQUESTEDBY, INV_PROJECTS.PRREQUESTEDTIME, INV_INVESTMENTS.APPROVEDTIME, INV_PROJECTS.PRUSERTEXT1, INV_PROJECTS.PRUSERTEXT2, INV_PROJECTS.PRUSERTEXT3, INV_PROJECTS.PRUSERTEXT4, INV_PROJECTS.PRFORMAT, INV_PROJECTS.PRFISCALSTART, INV_PROJECTS.PRUSERTEXT5, INV_PROJECTS.PRPCTCOMPLETE, INV_INVESTMENTS.PRIORITY, INV_PROJECTS.PRCLOSEDTIME, CMN_SEC_USERS.USER_NAME AS PRUSERNAME, INV_PROJECTS.PRSIZEADJUST, INV_PROJECTS.PRSIZEADJUSTON, INV_PROJECTS.PRSTARTIMPOSED, INV_PROJECTS.PRFINISHIMPOSED, PRJ_BASELINE_DETAILS.START_DATE AS PRBASESTART, PRJ_BASELINE_DETAILS.FINISH_DATE AS PRBASEFINISH, PRJ_BASELINE_DETAILS.LAST_UPDATED_DATE AS PRBASETIME, (SELECT USER_NAME from CMN_SEC_USERS WHERE ID=INV_INVESTMENTS.LAST_UPDATED_BY), INV_INVESTMENTS.LAST_UPDATED_DATE, INV_INVESTMENTS.NAME AS PRNAME, INV_INVESTMENTS.CODE AS PREXTERNALID, INV_INVESTMENTS.DESCRIPTION AS PRDESCRIPTION, INV_INVESTMENTS.IS_ACTIVE FROM INV_PROJECTS JOIN INV_INVESTMENTS ON INV_PROJECTS.PRID = INV_INVESTMENTS.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN CMN_SEC_USERS ON INV_INVESTMENTS.MANAGER_ID = CMN_SEC_USERS.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN PRJ_BASELINE_DETAILS ON INV_PROJECTS.PRID = PRJ_BASELINE_DETAILS.OBJECT_ID AND PRJ_BASELINE_DETAILS.OBJECT_TYPE = 'PROJECT' AND PRJ_BASELINE_DETAILS.IS_CURRENT = 1
